docs.text: sometimes i wonder just what the censors are thinking .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: take this film , " naked killer " , among it's ingredients are heavy doses of violence , rape sequences , straight and lesbian sex scenes and what our system calls " coarse language " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but what do those intelligent people at the censorship bureau choose to remove in case someone will get offended ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one word - penis .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that's it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in spite of everything else in the movie the one thing that the censors decide is too much is " penis . " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it really restores you're faith in the system , huh ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: anyway , that's just a side point .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when naked killer was released in the local independent cinemas around melbourne , it was advertised ad nausuem as a hip , cool , controversial thriller .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: what they forgot to mention was that it isn't very good .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot involves male cop tinam ( simon yam ) , investigating a series of brutal murders .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while getting a haircut he meets and finds himself attracted to a girl named kitty ( chingmy yau ) , who , after extracting revenge on the man who killed her father , falls in with professional killer sister cindy ( svenwara madoka ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: realising kitty has potential , cindy decides to train kitty in several unusual and ridiculous ways and gives her a new identity .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however in the course of his investigation tinam ( who believed kitty had disappeared ) , runs into her again , but isn't quite sure if it's her .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to complicate matters the actual serial killlers , princess and baby , who a former students of cindy , and have been told to kill their old master and her new student .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: from then the action ensues . . .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: all in all , this is not a well done movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the script is awful , the direction all over the place , the editing is jerky and confusing and the subtitling is surprisingly poor .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however the are a few stand alone pieces that do entertain .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the shoot out in the car park is almost woo-like in adrenaline .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the fight scenes are energetic and i guess it must get a few points for trying something a little different .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: let me put this way , if you like action - get something else , if you like strong women in movies - get something else , if you have do decide between this and " black cat " for your hong kong female action - don't get either .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even for curiosity value it just isn't worth it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: let's face it - if ever the was a movie that became popular on it's subject alone , this is it .
docs.label: negative
